summary: An internal FBI email from November 2020 requesting assistance from two agents to show digital discovery evidence to Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) on November 13, 2020, as part of the Maxwell investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; digital evidence is to be shown to her and her defense team at MDC.

connections.description: SA is part of the FBI team investigating Maxwell and is involved in the process of showing her discovery evidence.

events.title: Discovery Evidence Review at MDC
events.description: Planned event where FBI agents were to show digital discovery evidence to Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 was actively involved in the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation as of November 2020.
The FBI was coordinating to show digital discovery evidence to Maxwell and her defense team in a controlled setting at MDC.
The evidence review was scheduled for November 13, 2020, from 9:00 am to 3:00 pm.
The communication indicates ongoing pre-trial evidence disclosure procedures in Maxwell's case.
